name: Smelter
summary:
Smelter is a real time strategy-action platformer hybrid inspired by classic games of the 16-bit era. Players play as Eve, who teams up with the mysterious armor, Smelter, in her search for Adam. Expand Smelter’s fortifications throughout the various domains of the Rumbly Lands watched over by the Guardians and Watchers. Defend against onslaughts of enemies, discover lost ruins, meet new and eccentric characters and grow stronger before diving into pulse pounding, 2D side-scrolling action platformer levels.

- Combines the methodical planning of real time strategy games with the energy of action platformers.
- Bespoke handcrafted pixel art
- Three different Elemental skill sets, each with their own unique movement, attack and defense skills you’ll need to fight monsters, traverse levels, and solve puzzles.
- Three unique Domains with their own memorable stories, stages, side characters, enemies and bosses

name: Smoking Kills
summary: Follow an un-named gun-for-hire contracted to target smokers and smoking campaigns in this parody of assassin games.

name: SMOD
summary:
SMOD (short for SuperMod) is a single-player modification that adds new effects, weapons, and NPCs to Half-Life 2.

The new content consists of many new NPCs and weapons, new gamemodes, comprehensive customization and tweaking options, new abilities for the player, and new features to the gameplay, such as level randomization and simple branching in the otherwise linear flow of the main episodes.

This is a Japanese modification for Half-Life 2 that certainly throws some suprises your way.

name: Small Spaces
summary: Small Spaces is a relaxing game about turning small apartments into beautifully designed dioramas you'd want to live in. From a simplistic flat in Tokyo to a victorian townhouse in San Francisco. Your only limit is the space itself.

name: Smilinguido: Desafio na Floresta
summary:
The time has come!
Get a closer look at Smilingüido. Take part in a dangerous and fun adventure. Test your skills and limits inside the Brazilian forest. The challenge is great. The difficulties and dangers are enormous, but the mission is worth it.
Face the challenge and discover the great lesson that Jesus has to teach you, whom he loves and cares for!

name: Small Worlds
summary: A short atmospheric game about exploring.

name: Smol Ame
summary: A 2D platformer starring Watson Amelia and her friends, based on Walfie's "smol Ame" drawings.

name: SM64EX OMM: Super Mario 64 - The Green Stars
Smash Match
summary: I did this game for my final project in my Digital Multimedia class. This is an example of what you can learn in 10 weeks of ActionScript classes. It's nothing great, but I thought I might as well put it on here since I always wanted to submit something here anyway.

name: SM64 Coop Deluxe: Mario in the Multiverse
Smashing the Battle Ghost Soul
summary: Smashing the Battle is a hack-and-slash action game. You battle against robots using standard attacks, as well as combo attacks. By crushing the enemy, you can open up the way forward. By attacking the enemy, you can gain skill points, allowing you to unleash devastating attacks on large groups of enemies all at once. After clearing each stage, use the coins you have collected to strengthen your character, allowing you to take on even more enemies. You can also use coins to purchase different costumes with various abilities.

name: SM64EX Coop: Odyssey Mario's Moveset - Rebirth
Smogland
summary: The story is set in the far future. Earth is in ruins. The survivors are tracing the last detectable radio signal through strange portals while fighting off waves of different lifeforms across the lands, in hopes of finding an answer, and a way to escape Earth.

name: Smart City Plan
summary:
Smart City Plan is a modern city builder game: Plan zones, roads, public transport like trains, trams, buses, subways and even the hypertube. Set taxes and policies and implement smart city technologies. Generate a sustainable city and take care of your citizens.

Start by creating a few roads and specify zones where your citizens can start building their homes, shops and companies. Once everything runs fine, your can start expanding your city. Extend it by providing public transport for your citizens and implement policies. Ensure everything is taken care for: Pollution, noise, crime, waste, water, energy and so on. Your assistant will help you by guiding your through the process of doing all this easily.

The game is running in real-time, but can be accelerated and paused at any time. Manage policies, track financial data, analyze problems in your city. Expand the city when you have figured out how everything works and manage the public transport system, and build new infrastructure buildings, stations, rails, hypertube tracks, bridges, or even space ports.

name: SM64EX Coop: Star Revenge 2 - Night of Doom
Smashy Cannon
summary: Aim sharp. Fire fast. Smash everything.

name: SM64EX Coop: Star Revenge 4 - The Kedama Takeover 64
Smuggler's Guild
summary:
Smuggler's Guild is downloadable content for Smugglers V. It is a collection of three stories. 
 
Taken from GOG: 
 
The first story, "The Smuggler's Guild", starts with the retirement of your trader father through ill health. There's no money in being an honest trader these days. Smuggling contraband is a risky business, but the rewards are great - especially for those lucky or connected enough to join the exclusive Smugglers Guild. 
 
The second story, "Thirst For Vengeance", recalls the pirate raiders that killed your parents and kidnapped your sister when you were a child. As a graduate of the space academy with a ship of your own, the time has finally come to seek your revenge. 
 
In the final story, "Solomon´s Treasure", your father dedicated his life to finding the hidden treasure of Solomon McTavish, legendary pirate, and died without success. Perhaps you can do better - but you are not the only one seeking this vast fortune.

name: SmFly: Gravity Adventure
summary: Platformer with physics and gravity toggle.

name: SMA2 Micro-Hack: The Return to Dinosaur Land
SM64 Coop DX: Mario on Indigo Island
SM64 Coop DX: Waluigi's Taco Stand
SM64EX Coop: King Boo's Revenge X
SM64 Coop DX: Organ of Matrias
SM64EX Coop: Super Mario and the Marvel Adventure
Smasher
summary: An arcade VR action shooter set in a world of cyberpunk. Try all the armory in one go: shoot, throw, pick another one. Cast spectacular spells. Fight badass bosses and be badass yourself. Even deflect rockets with trash can lids!

name: SM64EX Coop: The Gate of the Good
SM64EX Coop
summary:
Online multiplayer mod for Super Mario 64 EX that synchronizes all entities and every level for multiple players.

The project was discontinued and a new community-mantained fork SM64 Coop Deluxe is its official continuation.

name: SM64EX Coop: Super Mario 64 - Twisted Adventures
SM64 Coop DX: Star Revenge 4.5 - The Kedama Takeover Rewritten
Smokin Potions
summary: Chaos reigns as up to 4 friends battle in a magical, explosive local-multiplayer showdown. Create your wizard, choose your magical affinity, mix elements, and craft explosive potion bombs to dominate the arena. Even in defeat, haunt and sabotage rivals as a ghost, seizing a second chance at glory.

name: SM64EX OMM: Super Mario Star Road
SM64 Coop DX: SM64 - The Green Comet
SM64 Coop DX: Goomba's Easter Egg Hunt
Smack That Gugl!
summary:
Gugl goes badly viral to drive you nuts: Are you ready for the smackdown ?

Gugl is back and he’s all pop and frolic! Splash, smack and trash these multiplying Gugls as fast as you can, avoiding the sick ones. Think you got it, wait and see how crazy the rhythm can be as the score goes up: hey big chef, can you pancake them all?!

Go berserk with your friends or for the world record with the global leaderboard: Gugl has alien ants in his pants, smack him if you can!

name: SMB3: The Rainbow Realms
summary: Featuring a fresh set of vivid, newly themed worlds, The Rainbow Realms is a complete 8 world hack, with level design aimed to emulate the style and creativity of the original SMB3. The difficulty curve is aimed at the average to good player of SMB3, though there are some challenging levels and a couple of difficult puzzles in the last few worlds.

name: Smith's Chronicles
summary: Forge your legacy as a blacksmith, transforming a humble village into a sanctuary where humans and fantastical races find home and harmony.

name: Small World 2
summary: Based on the phenomenally successful Small World fantasy board game with over 500,000 copies sold! Take control of insanely fun fantasy race & special power combos, such as Berserk Halflings, Triton Merchants, Alchemist Ratmen and Dragon-master Amazons, to grab all the land you can in a world that is just too small to share with your opponents!

name: Smell Like a Puddle
summary: — Each of us fell into a puddle. And everyone knows that you can find yourself after that... in a strange place from which there is no escape. Didn't it happen?.. Well, it's nothing — it's going to happen soon! You will have to explore your new home... and become a part of it. ^-^

name: Smart Baby Rattle
summary:
Smart Baby Rattle is an amazing kids app developed for babies and toddlers. This user-friendly app with colorful animation and curious sounds works well as educational and entertaining game for infants to learn real-life objects while playing. 

Smart Baby Rattle can be used as your baby’s first toy, as it is easy to handle and is also suitable for newborns who tend to get fussy and fidgety - let your baby discover new animals and plants or just listen to nature sounds and relaxing classical music which helps to calm down your little one by capturing his attention.

The game is provided with many opportunities:

- 11 different themes including Farm and Wild Animals, Christmas, Birds, Underwater World and Sea Animals, Vehicles, Musical Instruments, Space and many other exciting things to play & learn.
- Awesome vibrant colors and outstanding real-life sound effects.
- Best classical music for babies – Mozart’s greatest pieces. 
- Fine motor activities for your child’s coordination improvement. 
- Easy and intuitive handling with touch-and-move screen.
- Rattle sound effect when shaking your iPhone or iPad.

Check out the new Smart Rattle Kids App right now!

You are always welcome to ask for any information you need.
Feel free to send your questions, comments or suggestions to support@smartbabytouch.com

name: Smith and Winston
summary:
When a strange signal is detected in deep space the Federation orders Smith and Winston to go and investigate. What they find, after a brief nap, is a shattered ring world, aliens and an evil overlord called the VOID.

After crashing in to the ring world, due to a slight navigation error involving hitting an asteroid, you guide Smith and Winston through this strange new world.

Shippy, your ship, is there to help or maybe she’s there to kill you? Who knows? Either way, if you’re going to get home for another nap you’ll need to collect power cubes to repair Shippy!

Smith and Winston is a twin stick shooter for Windows, macOS, Linux, PS4 and Nintendo Switch. Featuring hand built levels in a custom engine optimized for fun and destruction.

name: Smoots Golf
summary: Hit the green with your friends at over 40 holes!

name: Smuggler Simulator
summary: Life at the border crossing is like a lottery - I never know what the next day will bring. People want to move all kinds of goods, and I help them. I love this job.

name: Smoots Summer Games II
summary: Compete with up to 4 players in Smoots Summer Games II, the cartoon-styled arcade sequel. Enjoy classic and new events like the 100m dash, swimming, cycling, archery, and more. Master game modes including Practice, Championship, Special Challenge, and Battle Royale.

name: Smart Moves 2
summary: "Smart Moves 2" is a pixel-art puzzle game with turn-based combat mechanics. Different worlds with levels of increasing difficulty, sneaky monsters, unexpected obstacles and great treasures await you. Smart moves are the key to survival!

name: Smash Court: Warm Up
summary: A quick and easy tennis duel simulator!

name: Smash T.V.
summary: Moving from one room to the next within the studio/arena, players have to shoot down hordes of enemies as they advance from all sides, while at the same time collecting weapons, power-up items, and assorted bonus prizes until a final show down with the show's host where you are finally granted your prizes, your life and freedom. One of the enemies is fat and is named Mr. Shrapnel who roams aside of the walls of some rooms and after a short period of time he explodes.

name: Smoots Pinball
summary: Enjoy an exciting and fun multiplayer pinball experience with Smoots Pinball! Play on 5 tables based on our popular Smoots games, complete missions, and unlock extras. Can you score 1,000,000 points? Play solo or with friends and show off your pinball skills!

name: Smash 1
summary: Smash 1 is a Super Smash Bros. Brawl mod which makes the game closer to the experience of the original Nintendo 64 Super Smash Bros.

name: SMYS: Show Me Your Stairs
summary: SMYS is a 2-4 player local-multiplayer party game. Challenge your friends in this building race to the top! Gather blocs in various minigames and then use them to build your stairs as fast as possible, use your special items wisely to disturb your friends' minds and capture the flag first.

name: Smith & Dungeon
summary: "Smith and Dungeon" is a hack-and-slash roguelite game, where you play as a blacksmith exploring dungeons, battling monsters, collecting materials, and crafting powerful weapons!

name: Smoke and Mirrors
summary: Smoke and Mirrors is the highlight of its compilation, starring Penn & Teller themselves. Besides being a game per se, it can also be used for a prank, like the other games.

name: Smart Factory
summary:
《Smart Factory》 is a third-person action adventure game with realistic scenes and exciting process. The player is in an abandoned factory, can open the box to use the sword as a weapon, can also use the fist, exterminate all enemies in the factory can win!When attacking the enemy, you should try to avoid the enemy's attack and ensure your own blood. If you encounter something like a jug you can break it up and get a bloody potion.There is a box in front of the birth point. If you open it, you can get a weapon sword. 
WASD control 
Q roll, break the jar 
Pick up the item and open the box 
Left mouse button attack, right click block 
mouseover 
I pause and view equipment 
The left Shift running

name: Smiling Misery
summary: Smiling Misery is an interactive tale that introduces us to the story of Margo, a jester who, weary of a comfortable life, embarks on a journey to seek misery. Join Margo on a brief adventure through a Mediterranean medieval kingdom and bring the story to its conclusion.

name: Smile For Me: Mega Happiness Bundle
summary:
The Mega Happiness Bundle includes:
- Physical copy of the game
- 100+ Page Artbook
- 1xLP Vinyl Soundtrack
- All 24 Habitician Trading Cards
- 4 Acrylic Standees
- Double-sided Acrylic Charm
- Happiness Fakts Desk Calendar
- Microfiber Cloth
- Lenticular Art Card
- 13-Sticker Sheet
- 2 Inked Stamps
- 9 Window Cling Stickers
- Soundtrack Download Card
- Collector's Edition Box

name: Smashball
summary: Smashball is a fast-paced, ultra violent first-person sports shooter. Two teams use super-human maneuvers, a real-physics grappling hook and high-powered weaponry to try to get a single ball into their opponent's goal. On the league web site, players can see match stats, create teams and participate in our cash tournaments!

name: Smashing the Battle: Ghost Soul - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Smashing the Battle: Ghost Soul Collector’s Box
Smashing the Battle: Ghost Soul Game (region free)
Smashing the Battle: Ghost Soul Manual
Smashing the Battle: Ghost Soul Original Soundtrack
Smashing the Battle: Ghost Soul Numbered Certificate

ONLY 2000 LIMITED EDITIONS MANUFACTURED

Get ready for a hack-and-slash action experience filled with bots, babes and a whole lot of bounce! Take the role of 4 armored heroines across intertwining stories of escape and espionage, each girl with her own unique skills, weaponry and fighting style. Combining 3D beat ‘em up mechanics with screen-filling “bullet hell” intensity, combat demands quick-thinking strategy and rewards efficient performance.

This updated version of SMASHING THE BATTLE includes all content from the original game plus the new Ghost Soul chapter set in 2086 AD, one year after the incident involving Sarah O’Connell, effectively doubling the content and introducing additional playable characters, more suits and dozens of challenging stages! Battle through robotic enemies to collect coins and scrap, then use those precious resources to upgrade skills, improve stats, unlock outfits or purchase in-game bonuses!

name: Smash Rush
summary: Rush, hit and smash your way through futuristic alien crystal glass tunnels, avoiding laser beams, traps and other alien obstacles! Explore colourful dimensions in a galaxy far away! Your task is to navigate monumental alien structures, smashing all crystal panels and score bubbles while avoiding deadly obstacles, and laser beams! The procedurally generated levels ensure every run is different! Sharpen your reflexes to climb the leaderboards!

name: Smashing time
summary: VR destruction simulation, destroy everything in the museum, the oval office, a restaurant or a simple flat ! Wreak havoc and let the devil out !

name: Smithy By Day
summary: Smithy By Day is a relaxed, turn based, shop-manager where you control a party of three. Use magical tarot cards to craft wares by day, and use mastered spells to gather resources by night. Learn to run a medieval blacksmithing shop, collect cards, discover recipes and progress through the story.

name: Smartphone Tycoon
summary: «Smartphone Tycoon» — unique business simulator. Create your own company for the production of smartphones! Your main goal will be to achieve worldwide recognition and take the company to the temple of fame of the global market.

name: Smerch Battle Arena
summary: Clash in furious combat in the yellow circle of the arena! Here, everyone will face bloody battles in PvP game modes and co-op to the last survivor. Fight for the leading positions and get valuable prizes for victory. Conquer glory in the arena as a Gladiator.

name: Smash Your PC
summary:
Imagine sitting at your computer when a big error message suddenly pops up! It talks about problems and losing all your work. That's exactly what happens in the Smash Your Computer game! Have you ever felt annoyed when technology doesn't work? Well, this game takes you right into that world!

Your mission is simple: you get to destroy a computer that keeps making mistakes. It's a chance to get back at the computer for all the times it's been troublesome. It's also a safe and fun way to let out your computer-related stress without any real-world consequences.

name: Smashing Spirits: Brazil's First Boxer
summary: Fight Spartans at Brazil Island with fiercely boxing combos on this insanely fast-paced fighting-platformer! Play with Aiyra, an indigenous boxer fighting in the middle of a conflict between her own people and foreigners coming from beyond the seas.

name: Small Bird Poem
summary: Fly from hideout to hideout, dodge gentle dangers, and watch your poem change with each choice. small bird poem is a short, interactive journey through natural and urban bird habitats. Play it with your youngest — or alone, for a quiet evening or bedtime moment.

name: Smokestack Saints: The Parkour Game Part I
summary: An exciting and action-themed parkour game set in an steampunk-fantasy desert parkour! Are you ready to join the fun? Join the adventure and start playing today!

name: SM64 Generations
summary:
SM64 Generations is a mod that adds Mario from Super Mario 64 to Sonic Generations, including its own abilities (including the famous Backwards Long Jump) and even the Wing Cap.

This mod needs both Sonic Generations and Super Mario 64 to work.

name: Smiley Dusty
summary: After a long day, Emily trudges through the pouring rain on the night of March 10th, 2000. Arriving home late from school and volunteer hours, she's met with an unsettling emptiness. Her family is nowhere to be found, having left abruptly for an important event. Alone in the house, a familiar warmth seems strangely absent. Emily is left to deal with whatever entities are trying to hunt her down...

name: Smiling Terror
summary:
Smiling Terror is a fixed-camera horror game in PSX style, inspired by the classics of the genre. It will be released in chapters – and Chapter 1 is already available in Early Access.

Once the project reaches a solid level of stability (based on your feedback and the number of players), our goal is to release new chapters to expand the story with fresh content, new dangers, and many surprises.

Will you be able to escape and survive The Smiler?

name: Small Town Robot
summary: Explore the small town of ShadeCreek in this Indie point-and-click adventure.

name: Smuta
summary: Smuta is a third-person action/RPG computer game developed by the Russian game studio Cyberia Nova.

name: Smuta: Zov serdtsa
summary: Are you ready to plunge into an incredible love story against the backdrop of one of the most dramatic periods in Russian history? Troubles: Call of the Heart is a visual novel that will take you to the era of Troubles. You will find yourself in the center of political intrigue, battles and love experiences! Players will face difficult moral choices, the impact of which can even change the course of history.

name: SM64: Beyond the Cursed Mirror
summary: SM64: Beyond the Cursed Mirror is a major Super Mario 64 ROM hack created by Rovert, which contains 15 custom-made courses and 120 stars waiting to be collected. With a unique in-depth story, original characters, and new mechanics, this SM64 ROM hack will provide a traditional yet unique experience.

name: Smoots World Cup Tennis
summary: Smoots World Cup Tennis is an Arcade Tennis game with plenty of possibilities.

name: Smugglers V: Invasion
summary: Smugglers 5 is the fifth installment in the turn-based single-player space trading game series. Will you be a greedy trader, an ambitious fleet pilot or a ruthless pirate? Board enemy ships, manage factories, conquer star systems and forge your own galactic empire - ultimately, your actions will have an impact on a galactic scale.

name: Small Sister
summary: Small Sister is a game about a contest: "living in a house with strangers". The goal is to gain as many points as you can by interacting with other contestants and to be the winner at the end.

name: Smart Baby Sorter 2
summary:
Smart Baby Sorter 2 is an easy to understand and exciting app for early development of children from 2-3 years.
Compare and sort objects with one touch. Each child will be able to play regardless of his or her age.

The app includes 12 mini-games with different colorful combinations of the objects under study. The games are built on the principle "from the simple to the complex" and will keep your child occupied from the very first minutes.
The child will get acquainted with a variety of different concepts and objects and learn to distinguish them.

The games include such concepts and objects as:
- Simple shapes, colors and sizes
- Animals and birds
- Land, water, and space transport
- much more

The application allows your child to develop logic, as well as attention, fine motor skills and discipline successfully and independently.

name: SMBX2 Demo Stages
summary: A collection of stages that showcase the characters added new to SMBX2.

name: Smoke Shop Simulator
summary: Run your own smoke shop in this quirky life simulation game. Decorate, manage customers, level up, and become the neighborhood’s go-to dealer (of legal stuff, of course).

name: Small Town Emo
summary:
Small Town Emo is a gay GameBoy walking-simulator. Follow the story of Ken, a 17 year old with an awkward crush on his best friend Fergus.

Talk to characters, solve simple puzzles, make (occasional) dialogue choices, and explore! Navigate through the complexities of a teenage crush, and let the story of this small town emo kid unfold around you.

name: Smack Monkey
summary: Monkey climb. Monkey fall. Monkey climb.

name: Smartphone Tycoon 2
summary: Welcome to Smartphone Tycoon 2! In this business simulator you can create your own smartphone company. Issue bestsellers and explore new technologies to expand your business and reinvent new smartphones. Become a market leader and get fans around the world.

name: Smash Boats
summary: Smash Boats is an action game with a seemingly simple goal inspired by the golden age of arcade games, which is to smash everything in your quest to unlock and conquer all the pools! Sounds easy; but, with relentless enemies, zany Mayday events, and unusual water hazards trying to hinder your progress, the goal is anything but easy! Smash Boats includes many unique pools to smash in, including a toy chest, a pool table and even a toilet! The game features 16 distinctive boats that have to be earned via sinking enemies and/or collecting stars by clearing stages. Each boat has a unique smash-ability, such as: frying pan, shark bite, lasers, water-pound, and many more. And with other moves like submerge, ram, backward ram, power-turn and brake, the player has an assortment of smash moves at their disposal to conquer stages, and collect stars. Collect enough stars and you will unlock new boats and pools! Can you become the ultimate Smasher by completing the insane shower pool?

name: SMW The Princess Rescue 3: The Turnabout
summary:
This hack is a direct sequel to the hacks SMW The Princess Rescue (released 2017) and SMW The Princess Rescue 2:Luigi's Journey(2019).
In those two hacks Mario and Luigi both went simultaneously in their own adventures to save their beloved Princess Peach and Daisy from the clutches of Bowser and Tatanga.

At the end of their adventures both went on a honeymoon with their Princesses and here is where SMWTPR3 start.

This time around the Princesses will finally have their time to shine in this role-reversal SMW hack where you play as Princess Peach and Daisy going into a mission to rescue their beloved plumbers.

This hack has:
- 88 new levels with 120 exits to find
- Custom graphics (mostly similar or in SMW artstyle)
- Custom music
- Custom sprites and bosses
- A new powerup
- Lots of ASM
- English and Brazilian Portuguese localization
and more.

name: SMIB: Mission Cure
summary: SMIB is a small robot with a big problem. Humankind can’t smile anymore and sent SMIB to space to find the cure. It needs YOU to remotely program its routes in its biggest mission: an adventure through the most exotic planets in the Universe. Solve puzzles, find the cure, and get SMIB back to Earth!

name: Smashing the Battle
summary:
In the year 2085, a huge multiplex construction site becomes a victim of a massive scale hacking incident.
Due to the hack, the construction robots starts to attack the workers on site. What could have possibly happened?

Now you can witness it yourself, with two unique characters to control and two stories to unfold!

name: Small Mouse Big House
summary: You play as Millie, a small mouse on a mission to find food for her kids in a house that's far too big—and far too dangerous. As Millie ventures through the enormous rooms, she’ll face towering obstacles and enemies that dwarf her in size. Can she outsmart these dangers and make it back to her family, or will the horrors of the house overwhelm her?

name: Smart Technology 2
summary:
It's the Christmas season. You have returned to Agatha's realm. You believe you've recovered from all the trauma of your first stay there. Things suddenly spiral out of control when Agatha is hit with a strange frequency and considers you an intruder all over again. You have to survive one more evening against Agatha while trying to return her to normal and decipher why she changed. Things may never be the same.

Return home.

Agatha is being watched.

name: Small Fry
summary: Use four small fries abilities to figure out how to get them back safely.

name: Smash Track Drifters
summary:
Smash, track race and drift your way into first place with Smash Track Drifters. An online multiplayer arcade racing game.

Explore single player challenges and multiplayer mayhem with upto 10 friends in a private match or take on the world in random online matchmaking. Bring a lead foot!

name: Smile For Me: Collector's Edition
summary:
Each copy of the Collector's Edition includes:

- Physical copy of the game
- All 24 Habitician Trading Cards
- 4 Acrylic Standees
- Double-sided Acrylic Charm
- Happiness Fakts Desk Calendar
- Microfiber Cloth
- Lenticular Art Card
- 13-Sticker Sheet
- 2 Inked Stamps
- 9 Window Cling Stickers
- Soundtrack Download Card
- Collector's Edition Box

name: Smite: X Edition
summary:
Become a God from ancient mythology and do battle in the #1 Battle Arena on Xbox. Now available in stunning 4K Native HD on Xbox One X!

As a special bonus, you’ll enter the Battleground of the Gods with the Japanese Warrior Amaterasu and her Shining Heaven Skin.
Download and play for free today!

name: Smells Like Fear Blossoms
summary: Misaki moves into her grandmother’s old home and takes part in the annual “Flower Festival” held in the town. What she thought was just an ordinary festival soon turns out to be something else entirely… Flight and exploration, choices and discovery—by collecting hidden items and fragments of memory scattered around the town, she forges ahead through a world steeped in fear and mystery.

name: Smithworks
summary: Smithworks is a first-person 3D cooperative multiplayer game where players play as fledgling blacksmiths. It is a humorous and chaotic experience where players will need to communicate effectively in order to craft these weapons quickly before the customers get angry.

name: Smash Simulator
summary:
Welcome to Smash Simulator, the unique management game where you become the owner of your own rage room!

Here, you can buy multiple rooms, choose and manage all the objects that customers break, and most importantly, remember to clean up after the chaos.

Every decision counts: you have to manage your resources carefully, renew items, and improve your rooms to satisfy your customers.

Business can quickly become intense, with exploding objects and increasingly demanding customers.

The game is still in development, but you can already play the demo version for free.

Come discover this original experience and, above all, unleash all your rage while having fun!

So, are you ready to smash everything and become the king of the rage rooms?

name: Smackhead
summary: Can you complete all the levels of Smackhead to escape from this strange dream and take the completion achievement?

name: S.M.S
summary: After Chance's girlfriend leaves... he starts getting strange messages from her number. Forcing him to do some pretty weird things

name: SM64 GBA
summary:
SM64 GBA is a non-profit fan project which aims to make a port of Super Mario 64 (along with new features, like new characters) for the Game Boy Advance. The project was started as a means of testing and improving how 3D games can be developed for the Game Boy Advance architecture, a capability that only a few commercial games made use of.

The game is still in development, but isn't currently intended to be released officially by the creator.

name: Smart-Attack!
summary:
Smart-Attack is a wacky brain-teaser bullet hell.
Help Jack the donkey survive a deranged, rejected educational game!
You'll need your smarts and your reflexes for this one.

name: Smugglers 5: Invasion
summary: Smugglers 5: Invasion is a standalone expansion for the turn-based science-fiction space trading game, Smugglers 5. It starts where the original game ended. After years of civil war, the Federation finally emerged victorious, crushing all rebellion. Then came the Jalkath, an invading alien race looking much like the tigers of Old Earth. Now war has returned to the galaxy. For the right kind of captain, it’s a whole new chance for fame and fortune. Will you be a greedy trader, an ambitious fleet pilot or a ruthless pirate? Board enemy ships, manage factories, conquer star systems and forge your own galactic empire - ultimately, your actions will have an impact on a galactic scale.

name: Smurfs Kart
summary: That is the question you will need to answer in this dynamic kart racing game in the world of Smurfs! The whole family can choose one Smurf, its kart and special power, then you’re ready to go on wild races!

name: Smurfen
summary: This is an unofficial game similar to Smurf: Rescue in Gargamel's Castle (ColecoVision & Atari 2600).

name: Smashometry
summary: Smashometry is a neon-soaked, three-button reflex score-attack game. Hit matching shapes, survive escalating speed, stack insane combos, and climb global leaderboards as the screen erupts with colour and an electrifying original soundtrack.

name: Smash and Bash Monsters
summary: An addicting Clicker-Looter game where you defeat Thousands of monsters to loot equipment and get stronger, that can be as Relaxing or Frenetic as you like!

name: SMW2+
summary: SMW2+ is the first ever full ROM hack of Super Mario World 2: Yoshi's Island. It has 54 brand new levels.

name: SMOD Troopers
summary:
SMOD Troopers is a multiplayer version of SMOD 40a, made from scratch.

The game features the SMOD Money system, that is used to buy health or battery, that is NECESSARY to use the flashlight or night vision in some dark areas.

Money can be gained through killing enemies, finding it in crates or trying your luck at the base's casino's SLOT MACHINE.

name: SM64 Coop DX: Extra Characters Plus
Smoked Fish and Cabbage 2
summary:
This romhack was created to test the player’s skill, patience and reflexes. It presents challenges difficult enough that a standard player may struggle, but indicators throughout are in place to help guide you to the goal. It's difficulty is between kaizo beginner-intermediate and players can expect to beat it within 1-4 hours depending on skillset.

This hack makes use of some more complicated tech that may be unfamiliar to the casual player- blue coins are in place to indicate spin jumps and green coins indicate item throws (usually shells). Color palettes and graphic choices were carefully picked to match the setting and create a tone for each level. Every level’s soundtrack was also carefully selected in an effort to create a satisfying gameplay loop as the player grinds each of the 28 courses. The map is comprised of several different zones strung together to feel like a complete world. Levels do not have a difficulty curve as there are plenty of ‘palette cleansers’ throughout. This design choice was decided to give the player a chance to breathe and continue progressing without wanting to destroy their controller in frustration after a lengthy grind.

name: SmartyTale 2D
summary: Fascinating, full of mysteries, an adventure with a storyline unfolded in the style of good old games with Retro Consoles!

name: Smash Sector
summary: Switch the walls to keep your ball in the sector, TO SMASH ALL THE INSECTS!!

name: SmugForce
summary: Slide and Dive through enemy bullets inside underground rave parties. Gun down the Neon Raver Gang, LSD and save Smugtopia, in this physics based third-person movement shooter.

name: Small Dragon Big Appetite
summary: Join Chompie as he explores the enchanted bunny kingdom, hunting down bunnies to satisfy his insatiable appetite! How many days can you go without starving?

name: Smashy Bubble: Gotta Pop em All
summary: A new kind of game that you play with one finger.

name: Smugglers of Cygnus
summary: Smugglers of Cygnus places you in command of a ship in the service of that noblest profession: Commerce. Travel the galaxy. Deliver goods. Deliver goods of questionable legality for higher rates. Fend off pirates, or perhaps become one yourself...The Galaxy is yours. Come and take it.

name: Smash Cars
summary: Set on a beautiful resort island, the fast-paced, bumper car gameplay transforms the relaxing setting into a frenzied raceway.

name: SM64 The Dark Stars
summary: SM64 The Dark Stars is a ROM hack created by Caasje, with 75 Stars and 10 main courses. This hack is fairly challenging with a wide variety of missions set to hard difficulty until the later courses become much more puzzling and trickier. The courses don't have a special Star requiring to collect 100 coins, in addition, there are extra content such as hidden signs, shortcuts, and secret endings to find as a case of easter eggs.

name: Smoke Break!
summary: Smoke Break! is a lighthearted 3D stealth puzzle game where you play as Applewood — a living puff of smoke. By breaking machinery, dashing past bakers, and using smoke to grow, you can hunt down the ultimate, yet elusive, burnt pie!

name: Smashing the Battle VR
summary:
In the year 2085, a huge multiplex construction site becomes a victim of a massive scale hacking incident.
Due to the hack, the construction robots start to attack the workers on site.
What could have possibly happened?
Now you can witness it yourself, with two unique heroines to control and two different stories to unfold!"

name: Smile Guide: The Apple Escape
summary: The official game of Kraina Grzybów TV, the peculiar YouTube channel about an alleged 1994 Polish children's show.

name: Smooth Like Butter
summary: Smooth Like Butter is a contemplative action sitcom sandbox game. Take control of the bacon and move smoothly throughout his home.

name: Smash Point
summary:
Dive into a cartoon-styled world, chasing and smashing each other with the coolest new weapons. Smash Point is a competitive multiplayer VR game full of visual fun.

The game is played in all against all mode, so the fun never ends because no one dies for long. The standard number of rounds is 10, one round can be set between 5 and 7 minutes long. The player with the most points wins. The game can host up to 10 players. Bots can be used to fill positions, and will automatically keep the number of players to a minimum of 6. There are 14 charismatic characters in Smash Point, so everyone can find their favorite.

name: Smash
summary: This game takes you into the mysterious world, where each level is striking in its beauty and harmony. You have to explore it.

name: SmileBasic 4
summary: This is the programming software, "SmileBASIC 4", that allows you to create and play games with Nintendo Switch! The programming language is "SmileBASIC" which is the most suitable language for creating games. Because it is based on the language "BASIC" that is easy to understand even for beginners and it has been developed for program learning. So, even those who have never experienced programming can work on their projects. Moreover, there are many materials and various tools to support your work development.

name: Smash 'n Grab
summary: Smash ‘N Grab is an adrenaline-fuelled, destructive beat ’em up starring Smash and Grab—a robot and raccoon duo pulling off explosive heists. Tethered by a rope, they loot everything in sight!

name: Smasher and the Will o' the Thiccs
summary: Golf meets growth! Smash your way through 11 exciting levels to save the city from the dreaded Will o the Thiccs!

name: Smite x RuneScape Premium Bundle
summary: Smite x RuneScape continues with this epic crossover bundle, featuring Sandwich Lady Amaterasu and Black Armor Bellona. Plus get 2 RuneScape chest rolls! Available for a limited time - don't miss out on this great bundle!

name: Smashed
summary: Play against your friends or players from around the world in rousing games ! One ball, two paddles, the goal is simple: Score as many goals as possible! For that, you will have to be reactive and strategic.

name: Smalles
summary: Smalles is a game where you will send your champion into the Dungeon to collect gold and also raise in strenght.You will acquire precious Talent Points that can be used to upgrade your character.

name: Smugglers V
summary: The fifth game in the Smugglers space trading series.

name: SML Wiki
summary: SMLWiki.com is a surrealist horror-comedy browser game, based loosely on Super Mario Logan, featuring many puzzles and rabbit holes.

name: SM64 Shining Stars Repainted
summary:
SM64 Shining Stars Repainted is a remake of SM64 Shining Stars made by pieordie1 and released May 30, 2020. It is a ROM hack (mod) of Super Mario 64.
Mario returns to the location of SM64 Shining Stars seven months after the events of Shining Stars 3: Sanctuary of the Star Comet.

name: Smol Gods
summary: A deity-drafting card game where you build a team of tiny gods, then battle another team by playing off your gods' powers and synergies.

name: Smack it! Punch Champion
summary: The arcade's popular attraction, the Punching Machine, is here! Test your power and become the ultimate champion!

name: SmileXCorp 3
summary: After helping the Resistance, and infiltrating the train bound for the corporation, you must take control of the situation and fight the enemy from within. Enter the Smiling-X horror game and help the Resistance defeat the evil corporation that is trying to manipulate

name: Smash Crates
summary: Smash Crates is a local/online fighting game where you build, destroy and manipulate the battlefield to your advantage. Fight for glory with up to 4 friends as the Crates of myth and legend. Be there and be square!

name: Smitty's Journey
summary: A 2D puzzle platformer adventure, set in a bustling continent of Dripsdale, natively inhabited by droplet-like creatures called Dropples

name: SmuggleCraft
summary:
As a smuggler, your hovercraft is your life. Customize your hovercraft to fit your needs and traverse the dangerous SideWays to increase your reputation. Evade the authorities and aid the many inhabitants of Dirahl to prove you’re the best smuggler around. 
 
Having no other choice, you agree to his deal and are back on the SideWays, accepting contracts to upgrade your craft and pay back your heavy debt to this mysterious and potentially dangerous character. Dirahl is a beautiful, yet unforgiving world. Will you be the one to save its inhabitants from the reigns of the Auros? Or will you let the Laws of the land be the only deciding factor for freedom? 
 
In a world where travel, trade, and technology are highly regulated and vitrually inaccessible for most, your deliveries and decisions could decide the fate of your world. As you traverse the unforgiving terrain, you will come to aid or betray the many factions and classes of Dirahl. With over 160 track pieces and over 50 unique hovercraft parts, no two missions will ever be the same. There are no set maps or tracks, so adapt to your opponents and surroundings in order to succeed. Build your hovercraft, make world-changing decisions, and race against your friends to prove yourself to be the fiercest smuggler on Dirahl in this adrenaline-pumping racing game.

name: Smart Truco
summary: Smart Truco’s gameplay is intuitive and easy to learn, even for those who have never played before. With simple rules, players can focus on developing their skills and strategies, rather than worrying about learning the game’s rules. Furthermore, the game’s interface is beautiful and colorful, and the graphics are attractive and engaging, ensuring that players have the best experience possible.

name: SmartBoy
summary: A smart young boy will face a lot of difficulties set by the teacher. Can he pass it?

name: Smoots Crazy Wave
summary:
Get ready for a splashing good time in Smoots Crazy Wave! This fast-paced arcade racer brings the beloved Smoots characters to thrilling water tracks where you’ll compete for victory. Whether you prefer classic Slalom races, powerup-filled mayhem, or intense Battle Royale showdowns, there's a mode for every type of racer.

Race across vibrant locations like Honu Island, Iceland, and the mysterious Lost World, using skill and strategy to outpace your rivals. And if you’re falling behind, grab a powerup to turn the tide! Play solo or challenge up to 3 friends in local multiplayer to prove who rules the waves.

name: Smash 'n Dab
summary: Dad’s gotta impress a squad of rowdy teens with his sick dance moves!

name: Smash Dungeon
summary: Smash Dungeon takes inspiration from arcade classics to bring you procedurally generated dungeon mayhem. Fight your way through the dungeons on your own or co-op, killing everything in your path to claim the riches below.

name: Smartplant
summary: The agricultural megacorporation Emmer Technologies is intent on controlling the world-wide food supply with their novel UtopiaBot technology. Play as Dr. Teagan Wixx who must confront Emmer and their controversial food revolution as she also struggles with a complex and very personal mystery.

name: Smart Technology
summary:
It’s almost Halloween. You’ve been hired to house-sit for the reclusive widow who lives on the outskirts of town. Her home is outfitted with the latest tech, and an impressive artificial intelligence named Agatha controls it all. But something has gone wrong. The AI considers you an intruder and will neutralize you at the first sign of perceived hostility.

Tread carefully. Survive the evening. Outsmart the AI.

Agatha is watching.

name: Smarty Pants
summary: How smart are you? Do you know more than your Grandma about world history? Does your little sister know more than your Dad about sports? Find out in Smarty Pants! Smarty Pants finally levels the playing field for people of all ages, allowing simultaneous play using age-targeted trivia plus action-based gestures, making it a truly trans-generational game made exclusively for the Wii. Tailoring questions to the contestant's age, gamers from eight to eighty can join in on the fun all at the same time. Exciting Wii gestures make everything a game, from spinning the category wheel and tug-of-wars over correct answers, to "dance-offs" for additional points. With both competitive and collaborative game modes and 20,000 questions in multiple categories, the fun is virtually endless!

name: Smash Out Colony
summary: Smash Out Colony launches you into roguelite breakout styled chaos. Time your hammer swings, launch projectiles, crush enemy hordes, and adapt fast with game altering tools and physics driven mayhem. Swing fast. Smash waves. Survive the chaos. You got this.

name: SmallZ
summary: SmallZ is a third person zombie survival game. Form a team or go solo to survive from many threats such as zombies, boss zombies and other players. Build fortifications on different buildings or build your own base from scratch. There are plenty of build parts available for you to craft!

name: Smasher
summary: Welcome to SMASHER. You play as Trinity Tritone, a guitar wielding metal head who has a huge gig at the end of the day and a problem to solve before she gets there- she doesn't know how to play guitar. Enter the most unlikely guitar teacher...

name: SMFly: Ice Age
summary: Platformer with physics and gravity switching.

name: SM64 Coop DX: Super Mario World in Super Mario 64
summary: A mod for SM64 Coop DX which changes Mario to his Super Mario World counterpart, with a specific moveset based on the SNES, like the faster sprint speed, the spin jump, different water mechanics, small Mario, among others.

name: Smithereens!
summary:
Stone Sling is the 20th official game released by Philips for the Videopac console. In the United States, it was sold under the title Smithereens! for the Magnavox Odyssey² console.

The game allows for two player simultaneous gameplay where both players have a fortress as well as a catapult used to fire each other. With each hit the fortress' size decreases by a bit. However, sometimes if your aim is off, the catapult will miss the fortress and instead hit one of the opposing soldiers. Like other Videopac games, Stone Sling could not compete against Atari games, though the game did do well in Europe and Brazil.
developers: North American Philips Consumer Electronics Corp.
publishers: North American Philips Consumer Electronics Corp.

name: SMB RMX: Shattered Realms
summary: SMB RMX: Shattered Realms is the 7th entry in Glitchworm Games's Mario fan game series where Glitchworm has to get all the Time Crystals to repair the Shattered Realms. With Wario Land inspired gameplay, you make your way through the Shattered Realms and go a journey to take back the Time Crystals from each Realm's Bosses, and look cool while doing so.

name: Smol Kobold Garden
summary: Collect, breed, and train small creatures known as kobolds. Expand your garden and compete in a variety of mini-games in a cozy creature raising game.

name: Small Arms
summary: And arcade Shoot'em/beat'em up/platformer. You plays as various humanoids that battle each other in arena combat.

name: Smack Talk
summary: Smack Talk is a 1-4 player online pvp platform fighting game where you must say your moves out loud. Beat your opponents with one liners and finish them off with ultimate moves in this chaotic new fighter!

name: S.M.A.S.H.E.D.
summary: Pigseye Peers is a newly-qualified surgeon sent to join the mobile military hospital unit in Korea - the Strangest Mobile Army Surgical Hospital East of Detroit, or S*M*A*S*H*E*D for short. Thus, the game is a clear spoof of the very popular TV series, M*A*S*H*. It is an adventure using text inputs with occasional graphics.

name: Small Radios Big Televisions
summary: Explore the inner workings of deserted factories in search of data cassettes that contain boundless virtual worlds. Collect more tapes and explore more worlds and you'll soon discover new methods of traversal and control that will take you farther than you'd ever expect.

name: Smash Mobs
summary:
Smash Mobs is an action packed defense strategy game where your primary concern is to expand your cities, all while protecting them from the monsters.Smash Mobs takes place in the world of Elysium, and you will need to try and restore Smash Mobs to its outstanding, former glory. 
 
Story 
 
There are 3 races in this region. The Dwarves, Elves, and Dragons have lived in peace and harmony for many years. But recently, more and more monsters have started to come to this land. The worst thing here is that the commandants and their troops have been captured one by one. There’s nothing we can do at this point other than fight back. 
 
Gameplay 
 
As you play the game, you will get to take the role of the remaining commandants and their armies. The great thing here is that you will be able to control a variety of commandants. You have dragons, for example, which can harness the power of wind, stone, lighting, crystals, and fire depending on their species. 
On the other hand, you have elves, which have stellar battle skills and agility. Dwarves are really good defenders as well, and they will be able to help you build up your defense. 
As you start to play the game, you will enter the battlefield, and the idea here is to focus on eliminating your enemies as fast as possible. A good combination of commandants and troops will be what you want to focus on if you want to reach success. 
Each battlefield will have multiple waves. You can either continue to the next wave or stop once you completed a wave. While doing more and more waves is better for you since you get more loot, you also put your commandants in danger. 
On top of that, Smash Mobs has multiple missions. These are rewarded with medals, and you can also get some gold too. The game will even bring you specific ranks that you can unlock as you progress. 
 
Features 
 
•	Smash Mode where you can battle a multitude of monsters and unlimited stages. 
•	Training mode where you can practice before you go on the battlefield. 
•	Multiple sound effects 
•	A large variety of commandants for each species. 
•	In the near future, Smash Mobs is set to bring in an area expansion, a town system, and a complete reward system! 
 
Graphics 
 
Graphically, Smash Mobslooks great, and it provides you with a constant state of immersion. The experience is a very fun and delightful one, so you are bound to enjoy what the game has to offer. Then there’s the fact that the gameplay is extremely interesting and nothing short of enticing. 
 
Finding the right balance between nurturing your commandants and knowing when to leave the battlefield is a crucial thing here. If you can do that and carefully level up and train your commandants, you will get to reach success extremely fast in the world of Smash Mobs!

name: Smash Bash: Date with the Desert
summary: Co-op shooter game with zombies, steampunk, alternative WW1 era and giant robots

name: Smelogs Playground
summary: Smelogs Playground is a Free-to-Play Real-Time Strategy game with charming aesthetics and a simple but effective gameplay mechanism. Take over the playful and rocky Smelogs to compete against each other for fun and honor!

name: SMW2+3: The Essence Star
summary:
After shipwrecking in a strange land, Mario is on the journey to collect the five shards of the Essence Star– said to benefit the world through people's actions. If it falls into the hands of evil-doers, though...

SMW2+3: The Essence Star is an advanced romhack featuring detailed storytelling, a shop system, and several surprises!

name: S.M.P.C.U.: Special Monster Pest Control Unit
summary: S.M.P.C.U. is an online co-op horror game for up to 4 players. As a member of the "Special Monster Pest Control Unit" your job is to remove extraterrestrial Monsters that have infested the pantries of fast-food restaurants. Work together to find them, trap them and get out. Don't wake the Monster!

name: Small Super Mario Bros. U Deluxe
summary: This Hack includes a grand total of 15 levels, where 8 of them are completely new.

name: Smoking Gun
summary: Smoking Gun is a single player, western themed, vertical scroller, shoot 'em up arcade game. Step into the boots of an Arizona Ranger and fight for justice as ruthless bandits descend upon Hickstown, convinced the lawmen are behind their gang's mysterious disappearances.

name: Smash Remix
summary: Smash Remix is a hack for Super Smash Bros. (Nintendo 64) with new content such as many new characters, stages and soundtrack.

name: SMYS: Classic
summary: SMYS : Classic is a 2-4 local multiplayer stairs building race game. This version of SMYS is what the game was planned to be when it was first designed, the Classic version.

name: Smashpunks
summary: Smashpunks is a frenetic online multiplayer arena battler where players compete for glory in a dangerous underground vehicle combat sport.

name: Smart Factory Tycoon
summary: Smart Factory Tycoon is a factory management and automatization simulator game about running your dream factory with robots. Design your dream factory, plan all steps of production, research new technologies and become a tycoon!

name: Smile For Me
summary: A heartbroken clown, wayward souls, and juicy mechanical lips. As “The Big Event" draws near, help the troubled residents of the Habitat and de-mask the mysterious Doctor Habit... before it's too late.

name: Smorca
summary: Help an orca to stay underwater by hacking the trap in time. Bounce a ball off the right walls to equate the numbers in the center.

name: Smash Tennis
summary:
Smash Tennis is a tennis game that was created by Namcot for the Super Nintendo in 1993. It was released in Europe as Smash Tennis by Virgin Interactive. A North American release of the game wouldn’t be seen until February 2020 where it would be part of the Nintendo Switch Online lineup.

The controls of Smash Tennis work similar to other tennis games and especially Namco's previous tennis game World Court Tennis: the player moves the athlete over the court and presses buttons with the correct timing in order to win the match. This time there is no story mode, but a tournament mode instead. Here the goal is to win the Grand Slam by playing various tournament matches. However. a match only has a single set. There are 20 athletes (both male and female) to choose from which have different advantages and drawbacks.

name: Smashing Pumpkins into Small Piles of Putrid Debris
summary: Pumpkins came in and stole all of the planet's candles. The player must pick up the axe and reclaim them.

name: Smol Adventure
summary: A short 3D exploration role-playing game with a click-to-move movement system.

name: Smashmuck Champions
summary: Exclusive content designed by Scott KurtzDungeon Master Z outfit and Boom Stick weapon designed by Player vs Player (PVPOnline.com) and Table Titans (TableTitans.com) creator Scott Kurtz is now available! Items can be unlocked through crafting and also purchased with either SmashBucks or ClobberCoins.About the GameSmashMuck Champions brings you fast-paced and twisted MOBA mayhem through a community-driven development process. Play as a robot shark, platypus-unicorn, yeti huntsman and more as you crush players across the globe in player vs player combat.

name: Smile Dog
summary: You’ve got mail. You shouldn’t have opened it. A classic creepypasta brought to life as a psychological horror, where one email is all it takes for things to go wrong.

name: Small Living World 2
summary: Is a full-fledged ecosystem simulator, bringing every aspect of nature to life. From the water cycle and plant growth, to animal behaviors and reproduction, observe your small living world evolve. All the tools are at your disposal to create your perfect forest.

name: Small Iron
summary: Jump and shoot your way across six levels to recover six weapons in your fight against the McCoy gang. Fight against rampaging wildlife in exotic locales across the territory to restore peace and order to the town of Little Brick.

name: Smintheus
summary: "Hybrid of classical puzzle , adventure and old school RPG genres with some experimental gameplay twists. Smintheus involves linear exploration, fighting against enemies, talking to different characters, having quests and solving puzzles both in classical way and Smintheus way, which is all about crafting gadgets and placing them at right place and right time. Main villain, who'll appear from time to time, will provide major challenge and boost up game's stealth mechanic at certain moments."

name: Smite Tactics
summary:
The Gods are at war. And you must lead them to victory.

Introducing Smite Tactics, a turn-based strategy game from from Hi-Rez Studios. Build an army from a large roster of mythological gods and creatures like Zeus, the Greek God of the Sky, and Odin, the Norse Allfather. Then wage war in competitive multiplayer matches or single-player adventures. It’s up to you to command your Gods, strategically position your forces to take advantage of the terrain, and unleash divine powers to defeat your foes.

name: Smiley's Revenge
summary: In a post apocalyptic world, it is up to you and your allies to restore order to the world to defeat Dr. Smiley.

name: Smash Hit
summary: An endless-runner-like rail shooting game in which the player launches balls to break glass obstacles.

name: Smash Hit Museum
summary: Smash stones. Collect artifacts. Build the world’s most profitable museum. A short clicker game set in the archeology room of a museum. Build up your collection and Upgrade until you break it.

name: Smile Town
summary: SMILE TOWN is an educational English-learning game for Windows and Macintosh, aimed at children ages 3 to elementary school. It covers phonics, pronunciation, vocabulary, and conversation through 14 activities with narration in Japanese, English, and Chinese. Players join characters like Andy, Motchan, Kii, and Gomappon in minigames such as ABC practice, number games, conversation recording, and phonics listening, combining playful interaction with basic language study.

name: Small Kingdoms
summary: Rule a small fantasy kingdom and conquer your rivals as you build up cities and armies on the world map and command troops on the battlefield. Small Kingdoms is a streamlined grand strategy and RTS game with small procedurally generated world maps, and campaigns you can complete in a weekend

name: SM64 Coop DX: Bananza Kong
summary: A mod which adds Donkey Kong, with his moveset from Donkey Kong Bananza, to SM64 Coop DX.

name: Smashing Four
summary:
Smashing Four is an online, mobile, PvP multiplayer game developed by Geewa. It is a turn-based strategy game using pool physics where players send their heroes into battles for trophies and orbs that contain rewards such as hero cards, coins and gems.

Smashing Four is a game of heroes and strategy. Player earns new heroes by winning battles in different arenas and upgrade them by collecting cards, coins, and gems. Each hero has a special ability that increases their effectiveness in battle. With many heroes to choose from, a team of four can have hundreds of variations, so it's up to the player to choose their best squad and upgrade their heroes strategically.

name: Smash N' Crash
summary: Where'd you get your driver's license? A vending machine? Doesn't matter—just punch it and survive. Build your ultimate death machine and tear through high-speed chases, explosive races, and chaotic deathmatches.

name: Smuggler City Simulator
summary: Build, expand, and customize your own office. In unique worlds blending Cyberpunk and Middle Eastern themes, sell your products, smuggle them through customs, and boost your profits. Use your wit and creativity to become the best in this exciting world!

name: Smile, you're being filmed
summary: Survive three nights by repairing anomalies, but beware of the killer who is lurking and ready to hunt you down! Your survival depends on careful observation and taking into account every detail. Explore every corner of the house, discover clues and use objects provided to escape your attacker. Scary surprises and unexpected twists await you at every turn. Can you unravel the mystery while avoiding constant danger? Up to you !

name: Smoke and Sacrifice
summary:
In Smoke and Sacrifice players assume the role of Sachi, a young mother on a quest to discover the fate of her child. The game takes place in a darkly fantastical world where grotesque plant life and animals roam and harsh societal customs rule. Taking cues from modern survival classics, Smoke and Sacrifice evolves the genre with its intensely personal story and complex ecosystem. Creatures forage, mate, breed and prey on one another, creating a living world. Only by taming the game’s wilds can Sachi hope to unravel the mystery at the heart of Smoke and Sacrifice.

Depicted in a beautiful, hand-painted style, Smoke and Sacrifice’s storybook visuals disguise its brutal story of motherhood and survival. Sachi doesn’t just have to worry about the game’s antagonists - the entire game world poses a threat. Players can alter the behaviour of plant and animal life, but this may also limit the resources Sachi has to craft items from. The deadly smoke also poses unique challenges throughout the game, altering enemy as well as player behaviour.

name: Small Claims
summary: Step into the shoes of an employee at North River, one of today's largest artificial intelligence startups, in this narrative choice-based game. But be careful: your choices can have small consequences.

name: Smirkers
summary: Through the transmission of happiness, more faces are full of smiling faces. Use the mouse to pull the smiley face to make it touch other faces. After many collisions, all faces turn into smiley faces. After winning the game, you can enter the next level.

name: Small World
summary: CONTROL FANTASY RACES, SET OFF TO CONQUER NEW LANDS, OVERTHROW YOUR ENEMIES AND CLAIM THE VICTORY! In this digital adaptation of the legendary board game, dive into a world inhabited by whimsical fantasy races.

name: Smokkehed
summary: Smokkehed is a music driven on-rails shooter set in a beautiful surreal world.

name: Smurf Life
summary:
Become the Hero & Embark on an Adventure to Save Smurf Village.
Gargamel has cast a stormy spell that threatens to veil the Smurfs’ village in darkness forever. One special Smurf will rise and become the savior of Smurfs' Village. Papa Smurf has chosen you to combat Gargamel’s gloomy plot!

Create a name and explore as you master new skills, gather resources, craft items and construct tools to counter the spell and push back the impending storm clouds.

Customize your clothing and accessories as you navigate the pathways of the Smurfs’ Village, overcoming obstacles and rescuing your trapped blue friends.
As the chosen Smurf, you’ll embark on an adventure. Complete quests, learn trades like Alchemy and Construction, and level up your skills to bring sunshine and happiness back to the Smurf’s Village!

name: S&M: FL
summary:
"S&M: FL" is a board + action reaction class of inverse tower defense game. Players need to roll dice on the board to move, and through various actions to eliminate the enemy stronghold, finally bring peace to the village!
In combat, players can make use of the Shield counter mechanic and use different skills to fight enemies.
Shield counter is when you look at the right moment to block an enemy's attack and use it to trigger skills.

name: Smite
summary: Smite is the online battleground of the gods. Players choose from a diverse cast of deities and use their unique powers to triumph over the opposition in 5v5 team matches. Smite is a new take on the MOBA genre; rather than observing from above the action, the game’s third person perspective puts players into the thick of combat. Instead of clicking the mouse to move, players use the familiar WASD keys to move and fight their way through Smite’s dynamic battlegrounds.

name: Smoking Simulator
summary: Smoking Simulator tasks you with surviving a stressful day at work armed with only a handful of cigarettes.

name: Smalland: Survive the Wilds
summary: Experience a big adventure on a tiny scale! Enjoy multiplayer survival in a vast, hazardous world. Preparation is key when you're this small & at the bottom of the food chain. Craft weapons & armour, tame & ride creatures, build encampments & explore a strange new land.

name: Smash Ball
summary: Smash Ball is a fast-paced, hard-hitting competitive sport where you claim victory by any means necessary. name: Smart Ball
summary:
The game involves going through 8 stages (broken up into two parts each) of side-scrolling action. At the end of each stage is a boss monster that must be disposed of.

Jerry moves by sliding across the ground and can latch on to walls and climb them. Jerry can also jump, stretch out to cling to ceilings, and also move at a faster pace. Jerry can consume balls that he finds during a stage and can then fire them out of his body at enemies blocking his path. Enemies can also be defeated by jumping on them and then flattening Jerry's body on them. Also, there are flowers that contain items for Jerry to collect. Items include life, which refills health, a 1-up that adds an extra life, and a seed, which will grow a climbable beanstalk when planted. If the player collects the scattered letters that appear in every stage that spell out the name Jerry, the player will earn two extra lives.

name: Smile

name: Smart Puzzles Collection
summary:
Smart Puzzles - a collection of puzzles in a cool design, a lot of games in one game. We put together different cool puzzle games in one game that takes up little space. 
 
Smart Puzzle game is suitable for those who like brain games, brain training or logic games. 
 
The game takes up little space 
The game takes up little space and therefore even on weak devices it will be easy and comfortable to play. 
 
- Many games in one game 
A large number of the most popular puzzles was collected. There are more than 5000 levels with different blocks, shapes, and forms. 
 
 
- A game for the whole family 
The game is suitable for both adults and children. The game can be played by children from 3 years old, as we have divided all the levels into 6 groups depending on their complexity. Therefore, our puzzle is for the whole family. Jigsaw puzzles for adults without the Internet. 
 
 
Collection of games "Smart puzzle" – these are the best and most exciting logic puzzles with minimalist graphics and beautiful design! 
 
Our collection of games includes: 
 
Block Puzzle 
 
Move the blocks into special shapes. The shape for placing blocks can be either a simple rectangle or a square, or a more complex shape. 
 
Hex Puzzle 
Blocks are assembled from hexagons (hexes), which also need to be moved to the form. 
 
Pipe games 
It is a simple and addictive puzzle game. The idea of the game is very simple - you need to lay the pipeline using the existing pipes on the playing field. 
 
Symmetry 
It is an original and addictive puzzle game based on physical laws. You must help the figures achieve symmetry. Accordingly, this test is not only for your logic, but for the ability to judge by eye. 
 
One line puzzle game 
The game One line will require you to do the strategic planning and logical thinking. On the playing field there are points that you have to connect with just one line. 
 
Path 
Go through your path using all the slots on the playing field. 
 
Puzzles with matches 
Puzzles with matches - in this classic game you have to solve puzzles with matches. Move, add or remove matches until you find a solution. 
 
Crystals 
A classic block puzzle with a non-classical approach in which there are levels and very interesting tasks to train your brain.

Easy, you'd think, but the characters are clever and your task gets harder as the more demanding levels host different bonuses, just waiting to be picked up by the escaping characters.
Collect an average of 2 artifacts per level to unlock the next world.
Carefully designed and developed AI resulted in a highly intelligent and sneaky opponent creation which introduced a definite innovation in the board games community.

It's a dangerous life for a pilot on the front lines, but it can also be a lucrative one - are you an honest trader, or does smuggling illegal goods sound more profitable? summary: Smash T.V. is a frenetic, dystopian shoot-'em-up set in a futuristic game show where violence and consumerism collide. Created by Eugene Jarvis, the mastermind behind Robotron: 2084, this game takes place in 1999 and puts players in the role of contestants fighting for survival and prizes in a series of deadly arenas. Using a unique dual-joystick control scheme, players must blast through waves of enemies, including mindless beasts and killer robots, while collecting an array of outrageous prizes ranging from toasters to luxury cars. The game's satirical take on consumer culture and media violence is underscored by its over-the-top action and gore. With its intense two-player mode, Smash T.V. offers a relentless, adrenaline-pumping experience that combines skillful shooting with dark humor, creating a cult classic in the arcade shooter genre.. This is the Commodore 64 port of Smash T.V.

name: SMW2+2
summary:
SMW2+2 is a ROM hack of Super Mario World 2: Yoshi's Island, which builds a whole new game using the engine of the original game.

The stork was peacefully on his way to deliver future heroes Baby Mario and Luigi to their parents, when all of a sudden, Kamek appeared in the skies. He quickly attempted to snatch the babies from the stork, only managing take Baby Luigi, while Baby Mario fell to the ocean. Luckily, he lands on Yoshi’s Island. The Yoshies gather and ponder how to remedy the situation. The Yoshies decide to carry along Baby Mario, and call upon the Chosen One to face Kamek. The Yoshies don’t know the exact identity of the Chosen One, but know that he always watches over and protects the Yoshies, and has an immense amount of power.

Why has Kamek kidnapped these babies? And just who is this mysterious Chosen One? You will find out when you play!

What this hack features…

50 all-new levels of classic Yoshi’s Island design! Journey through 5 worlds to reunite Baby Mario with Baby Luigi.
Now unlock an Extra and a Secret level by scoring 100% on each world!
Enhanced Yoshi colors! Every Yoshi now has its own boot colors, as seen in the introduction scene. Plus, two new Yoshi colors, gray and black, for the Extra and Secret levels.
Pit of 50 Trials, inspired by the Pit of 100 Trials in the Paper Mario series. How many floors can you beat? And what will you win?
Custom level icons

name: SmartGo Player
summary:
Play the ancient game of Go against your iPhone or iPad. Starting with the empty board, your goal is to surround territory — the simple rules of Go lead to a complex and beautiful game. This 4000-year-old board game originating in China is also known as igo (囲碁), wéiqí (围棋), or baduk (바둑).

SmartGo Player includes a tutorial that teaches you the fundamentals of Go step-by-step. Each rule and tactic is followed by a number of problems that let you practice and fully grasp the concept.

If you enjoy strategy board games like chess or Othello, you'll love Go.

SmartGo automatically adjusts the handicap to keep the game challenging, for beginners as well as seasoned players. Start with 9x9, and unlock 11x11 and 13x13 as your play improves. With a strong engine based on the latest research into Monte Carlo techniques, this is the game to beat.

Features:
- 9x9, 11x11, 13x13, and 19x19 boards
- Strong game engine
- Fast response (adjustable)
- Automatic handicap adjustment on 9x9, 11x11, 13x13
- Manual choice of handicap and board size up to 19x19
- Track level per user
- Computer resigns when too far behind (can be turned off)
- Territory estimator
- Hint
- Undo
- Replay
- Tutorial with over 100 problems

SmartGo Player is optimized for a quick and challenging game of Go against the computer. SmartGo Kifu is designed as a versatile tool for Go players who want to study professional games, practice Go problems, record their games, as well as play against the computer.

Enjoy!

name: Smokin' Guns
summary:
Smokin' Guns is a total conversion of Quake III made available as a stand-alone title. It is a multiplayer game with a western theme with the game modes duel, deathmatch, team deathmatch, round teamplay, and bank robbery where one team consists of outlaws trying to steal gold and another as lawmen preventing them from entering the bank. 
 
The game comes with many maps set in deserted towns, a mine, a steamboat and an express train. The arsenal consists of single or dual pistols, shotguns, machine guns, shotguns and other items such as a scope, dynamite and boiler plates. Weapons can be found by picking them off dead players or through the in-game buy menu. Cash for the weapons is earned by killing players or by collecting it in the level where it respawns regularly. Through the same menu, ammunition can be bought. 
 
The levels often offer a stealth approach, hiding behind crates or shooting through windows that can break. Weapons can only contain a small amount of bullets (unless an additional ammo belt is bought) and need to be reloaded regularly. Different body parts can be targeted for different damage and when hit players notice a small slowdown in movement. 
 
Singleplayer is also available with all the team modes, but with the same maps and game modes to be played against bots with customizable skill levels. It is also possible to play a game with a handicap to even the odds. All levels come with a proper soundtrack that fits the theme.

name: Smash Bandits Racing
summary:
Named as one of TouchArcade's Top 10 Games of the year 2013. From the makers of Smash Cops – crash through America in the craziest road race to hit the App Store.
Power up to faster cars, get the edge with getaway gadgets and outrun the cops as you speed to the state line.

Well, almost. Whichever route you take through an ever-changing world of dirt tracks and dusty logging towns you can crash and bash your way through smashable scenery in the most intense display of destruction you have ever seen.

Make sure you’re always ahead of the game (and the cops) with cool car upgrades. Start with a puny compact and make it awesome with extra speed, handling and strength. And when you start earning big, you might just get your hands on the fastest road car on the planet, the stunning Hennessey Venom GT.

What crazy road race would be complete without a TV chopper hovering overhead? The further you get and the more you smash, the bigger the TV ratings and the more cash you earn. Play against your Facebook and Game Center friends to see who can become the most famous Bandit on network TV.

Before you head off you get to choose something to help you along the way. Stinger-proof tires, the 'Stunner' car taser and even a tank are available to give you the edge over the relentless Sheriff McBride and his deputies.

Innovative one-finger control makes it super easy to drive, drift & spin your car, and unleash those helpful gadgets - no matter where you’re playing.

The Smash Bandits race organisers don’t think that simply out-running the cops is a big enough problem, so they’ve put together over 100 challenges where you can test your driving skills to the limit.

name: Smoking Guns: Shooting Gallery!
summary:
Smoking Guns: Shooting Gallery! is a virtual shooting gallery with different themes: from western levels with towns and forts to alien invasions and a base on Mars and horror levels with ghosts and monsters. Each level has an extensive amount of variations that can be defined precisely or left to chance. With a variety of weapons, including colts, a shotgun and a machine gun, you have to sweep the levels before getting killed or running out of time. Weapons reloads happen both manually or automatically. 
 
The gameplay is spiced up with innocent civilians wandering about, hidden and special targets and parachutes with bonuses. These bonus objects include multipliers, sticks of dynamite, extra time, slowdown, bonus scores or new weapons. Sometimes, when shooting a parachute, a focus event is started, a small action sequence with different gameplay: 
Armageddon: Wipe out swarms of enemies with your machine gun 
 
Duel: One bullet, one enemy playing dead. Be the first to shoot before he stands upright completely. 
 
Hit 'em All: Make successive shots to increase your multiplier. If you miss or hit a civilian, the multiplier is reset. 
 
Hit 'em Hard: The targets require multiple hits to disappear. 
 
Sniper Time: A single enemy is hiding in a group of civilians. Shoot him before he vanishes. 
You can replace in-game targets with your own pictures and the best highscores are saved on the internet.

summary:
