The game includes both static and moving objects, which promotes better development of kid’s coordination and fine motor skills.

Smart Baby ABC is suitable for children from 2 years and above and also for babies with autism.

Simple and intuitive control will make the first encounter with english alphabet and first words easy and cheerful.

Distinctive features of the app:

- Includes 4 games and more than 50 levels for studying english alphabet, numbers and words 
- All levels are created on a “simple-to-complex” basis, a kid of any age can start playing
- Simple and intuitive one-touch control 
Develops kid’s logic, fine motor skills and attention

name: SMOD: Outbreak
summary:
I have been laid down in a pit of darknesses and the shadow of death. And thy anger has pressed down upon me; and all thy cares have come down upon me. And from this bed I cry out for the kindling of thy Light!

Outbreak might be best summed up as an add-on to the original SMOD that encourages the same frenzied action as it throws a generous number of hostiles at the player, especially zombies. Following its base, Outbreak's arsenal includes usual suspects like the G36 carbine, as well as less conventional ones such as a katana that gives the player a speed boost.

Outbreak started off in Summer 2007 as a small, personal mod by SMOD: Tactical forum member veteran_gamer. His hobby project was later released and was well received. As time went on, others like Useful, Jen4, and IneptGuard contributed work and ideas as well.

name: Smokin' Guns - Shooting Gallery
summary:
The game represents a shooting gallery with six scenes, each with a different guns and targets: a total of 36 guns and over 100 targets. 
 
The scenes represent: 
1) Gangsterland. You as a law defender take on the crime lord and clear the streets of his filth. 
2) House on the Hill. You survive through a night at haunted house or become a permanent resident. 
3) County Fair. You visit a county fair and try to score as much bounties as possible. 
4) Neptune Six. You defend the control room against renegade android raiders. 
5) Silicon Gulch. You siege a Wild West town to get rid of bandits. 
6) Terminal Flight. You rescue the hostages in airplane full of terrorists. 
 
The events of the game occur on static screen, where you should shoot as much enemies appearing in certain places as possible. Innocent people should not be touched. Time is flown, ammo should be reloaded, and points are gained for successful actions. Top Scores are stored for each scene separately.

name: Small Soldiers: Globotech Design Lab
summary: Small Soldiers: Globotech Design Lab is a 1998 PC strategy/action game based on the film Small Soldiers. In it, you can either design and build your own squad of soldiers or choose from pre-built characters. The two teams are the Gorgonites or Commando Elite. You choose specific parts you want your soldiers to have, such as arms and legs. You can also choose what kind of computer chip controls the soldier, what kind of voice they have and what weapons he will carry. After you create your soldiers, you then battle the opposite team. It was published by Hasbro Interactive.

name: Smithy Wars
summary: Discover Recipes. Try out tactics. Customize a fireball. Smithy Wars is a fighting game with a heavy focus on crafting and customizing spells. Fights are made by the AI based on the tactics, spells and items provided to your fighters.

name: Smoop Can't Sleep!
summary: Smoop Can't Sleep! is a short, high-intensity 2D sidescrolling platformer - shooter where you play as the titular Smoop, a centuries-old wizard whose sleep has been rudely interrupted by unknown intruders.

name: Small War
summary: You need to choose your camp and build the building! Build combat units through barracks and factories, and then manipulate combat units to destroy enemy bases!

name: Smashfruit
summary: Smashfruit is a lighthearted, 2D action-platformer. Play with up to 4 players and work together to gather collectibles and complete courses together!

name: Smash simulator
summary: Is life full of infinite pressure and helplessness, but nowhere to vent Is reality filled with countless injustices and grievances, yet nowhere to confide in Come to this virtual world and release yourself!

name: Smart Fart
summary: Smart Fart is a silly strategy game about a warehouse worker who ate too many beans. Your resource is your main enemy, so spend it wisely !

name: Smurfs Save the Day: Harmony Smurf
summary: A Smurfs game for the Atari VCS Voice Module. Teaches about music.

name: Smashteroid
summary: A small fast paced platformer game

name: Smol Birb
summary: Take time to travel along with Zyablik, a small bird who is desperately searching for missing stars.

name: Smiley World: Island Challenge
summary: Join Smiley and friends in his first ever video game for an exciting Island adventure. Marooned on a desert island, you and your team must participate in various challenges to overcome the hazards of the land while collecting rewards and treasure. Along the way you'll meet island natives (some friendly, and some not-so-friendly) who may help or hinder you as you progress through the many games of skill, logic, and instinct. Explore and discover! Experience the danger, action, and adventure when you play Island Challenge.

name: Small Santa Simulator
summary: Put items back in their places in a winter wonderland as you try to beat your fastest time. Small Santa Simulator is a 2D platformer where you collect holiday themed items and put them back where they belong. Christmas is soon and everything must be ready for the big day, will you save Christmas?

name: SM64CoOpDX
summary: sm64coopdx is an online multiplayer project for the Super Mario 64 PC port that supports widescreen, uncapped FPS, and has many toggleable options for customization to fit your desired experience. It has multiplayer up to 16 players and an ever growing powerful Lua modding API that allow modders and players to enjoy Super Mario 64 in more accessible and unique new ways!

name: Smash Supreme
summary: A mobile/iOS game.

name: Smash & Magic
summary: Smash & Magic is an action game released on Android and iOS devices, its gameplay is acting like ramming marble to attack enemy.

name: Smash Halloween Pumpkins: The Challenge
summary: Smash Halloween Pumpkins: The Challenge is a 2D Old School Action Platformer in which the mission of the player is to smash as many pumpkins as possible.

name: Smells Like A Mushroom: 100% Vegan Edition
summary:
Includes super-cool neon effect cover, awesome sticker sheet, stunning boss guide

Features
CHILL OUT AND LAUGH WITH THE MAGIC MUSHROOMS
The fun is provided by hilarious dialogues and a plot filled with symbols of "human" pop culture.

STOP THE MUSHACRE!
Take on the role of the carrot commando to liberate every planet in the solar system.

Use a variety of weapons to defeat different enemies and customise your appearance - will the vegetables succeed?

PLAY ALONE OR BRING A FRIEND
Enjoy the single-player mode with a bizarre storyline or join forces with a friend in split-screen co-op for two players.

EXPLORE SPACE WORLDS
Vast interstellar maps with a beautiful galactic art style accompanied by retro electro music.

name: Smashing Star
summary: Smashing Star is a 1v1 Catapult Battle game. Players drag characters to catapult and hit enemies while graffitiing the battleground. The player who gets more graffiti done wins the game.

name: Small Demon
summary: Small Demonis a 2D action roguelike that immerses you in the dark world of hellish labyrinths. As a small but powerful demon, you will face countless different enemies who are trying to destroy you! You need to move around the location, pick up more powerful weapons and destroy enemies.

name: Smash Court Tennis 3
summary: The first entry in the series for PSP, Smash Court Tennis 3 arms players with twice as many customizable items than its predecessor including racquets, sportswear and more as they compete to be #1 in the world. Perfect a devastating array of strokes from a selection of top ranked and promising professional tennis stars, each of whom are modeled after their real-life counterparts. Own the court by developing and acquiring new skills such as increasing your hit speed or serve accuracy. Mental elements also play into how characters act and look, so stay focused on your game! Test your skills in various gameplay modes including Arcade, Exhibition, and Pro Tour Mode. Want a quick hiatus from the circuit? Try one of the imaginative and addicting mini games!

name: Small Aircraft
summary: This is a classic flying shooting game with exquisite and simple graphics.

name: Smoked
summary: Fast-paced Mafia topdown shooter shrouded in mystery and spattered with blood.

name: Small Islands
summary: A game made for the Weekly Game Jam #40, with the theme 'Small World' !

name: SmashThem
summary:
Help Kitto, the magic cat defend his birthday cake from those nasty bugs. 
You only have to touch the bugs to crush them! 
From time to time Kitto will help you by activating one of his powerful magic spells! 
 
Characteristics: 
- Different types of bugs (With different special abilities). 
- Several magic spells. 
- Different times of the stage. 
- Unlock more powerful spells. 
- Change Kitto's appearance. 
- No annoying advertising for the user.

name: Smol Snek
summary:
Can you feed the hungry snek and avoid corruption?

smol snek is a small snake game for the Atari 8bit computers. Your playing style affects the chance for snek to get corrupted by food.

Earn bonus score by picking up food guaranteed to not corrupt snek. Corruption can spawn bad food, grow snek, make the play field shake or melt in with the background.

Avoid corruption long enough to unlock the secret level!

The game has been tested on a PAL Atari 600XL expanded to 64K, and an PAL Atari 130XE. The game should work fine on NTSC machines, and the snek speed is adapted to be the same on both variants to make high score table fair.

name: Smok: Legend of the Laid-Back Heroes
summary: Smok: Legend of the Laid-Back Heroes is an RPG Maker fangame themed around the talents of Hololive. To prevent the awakening of the Demon Lord, the main character, accompanied by Subaru, Mio, Okayu, and Korone, embarks on a very absurd adventure.

name: Smash Up
summary: Deck shuffling card game with factions such as Ninjas, Pirates, Zombies, or Aliens. Shuffle them together to create a force to be reckoned with.

name: Small Soldiers: Squad Commander
summary: An RTS game based on the Movie Small Soldiers (1998).

name: Smelted Kin
summary: Science fiction 2D shooter with platformer and metroidvania elements. Players will have to explore a huge research complex consisting of nonlinear levels, which is crowded with robots

name: Små Ord
summary: Finn dyret som elgen tenker på i flotte naturomgivelser. Gjett deg frem ved hjelp av bokstavene og se om du klarer utfordringen!

name: Smetanka
summary: Immerse yourself in the world of adult business. In the fascinating game «Smetanka» become a star of virtual entertainment. Encourage your fans and recruit new ones that will give you the means for further development.

name: Small
summary: A hidden object game for PC and Mac.

name: Smipat and the Lost Bones
summary: In Smipat and the Lost Bones you follow the life of Smipat, a necromancer's pet with a will of it's own. Smipat has lost some of it's bones and is going on an adventure to find them. Each bone has it's own unique ability that makes it possible to overcome the challenges ahead.

name: Smash Table Tennis
summary: This table tennis game was originally released only in Japan for the Famicom Disk System.

name: Smalls Island Woes
summary: Go to work, the lighthouse won't fix itself.

name: Smart Dart
summary: Three modes are offered in the game: Classic, where the player has to get as high of a score as possible within a time limit, Challenge, and Training. The player holds the controller vertically as if they are pinching it on its sides and throw it to throw darts in the game.

name: Small Pixel
summary:
A small pixel sandbox game with lots of interesting stuff,
Find food, live, and explore

name: SM64EX
summary:
SM64EX (also known as sm64ex) is a fork of the original Super Mario 64 Port. This fork was made to be easier to mod, being later forked to other repositories like Render96 and Super Mario 64 Plus. It has support for many mods like DynOS, Cheater, Mario Odyssey's Moveset and others.
It has integrated new camera options, cheats and visual enhancements for modern platforms, supporting Windows, Linux, MacOS, FreeBSD, Raspberry Pi and WebGL.

name: Smurf
summary: An LCD Smurf game shaped like a Smurf.

name: SMH
summary: A game released exclusively inside the Disk NG 2 bundle.

name: SMW Remade from Memory
summary: We challenged ourselves to reconstruct all the levels, maps, and songs in Super Mario World (1994) based purely on what we could remember. The result is thoroughly unsettling. Please enjoy this testament to the fallibility of human memory.

name: Smoking Simulator
summary: Have you ever wanted to relax and have a good smoke in an atmospheric village? Then you are exactly at the right place - take a drag on your cigarette and go ahead and explore our wonderful world.

name: SM64: The Green Comet
summary: A hack that takes the concept of Green Stars from Super Mario Galaxy 2 and applies it to SM64. Each level has Green Stars hidden throughout it, that are tricky to find or get. There is also a brand-new, bonus level unlocked after 120 stars.

name: Smudge Adventure
summary:
Smudge is afraid of storms, he will always run from it! There is a big one coming and he is really far from home.

Can you help him get home safely? The path is full of obstacles.

name: Smothered Hope
summary: Single-player, Boom compatible map

name: Smiths & Legends
summary: Smiths & Legends is a top-down co-op Blacksmithing RPG. Craft recipes within the time limit with your friends while defending your shop from monsters. Go through the 60+ levels, fight monsters and bosses, and level up your party!

name: Smash Balls
summary:
Test your aim and timing in this fun and fast game

Take out all of the red enemies without running out of ammo

Build up a frenzy to unleash hellfire on the enemies

Smash everything and watch it crumble away!

name: SMYS: Costumes
summary: Customize your zglubs with 100+ items to mix together.

name: Smurf
summary: An LCD game in the Double Wide Screen line by Tiger Electronics, released in 1984.

name: SM64 The Green Stars
summary: Super Mario 64 The Green Stars is a ROM hack made by Kampel125 and released in 2013. This hack features 131 stars spread over 15 new levels and 7 secret levels. The Green Stars is often compared to Super Mario Star Road, a particularly notable hack, as a hack that feels much like the original Super Mario 64.

name: Smashboard
summary: Smashboard is a fast-paced action game where you constantly defeat bosses while dodging their attacks and attacking them when you can. As you defeat enemies, you will earn their charms and use them as upgrades to face other bosses after creating a build for your own play style.

name: Smurfs Save the Day: Greedy Smurf
summary: A Smurfs game for the Atari VCS Voice Module. Teaches about colors.

name: Smoke Attack 2
summary: Smoke Attack 2 is a video game published in 2004 on Windows. It is an action and educational game, set in an arcade, with themes of health nutrition, shooter and western.

name: Small World Z
summary:
A new adventure every time you play.
Travel through an INFINITE OPEN WORLD and interact with an ENDLESS amount of NPCs in an UNDEAD SURVIVAL ACTION-RPG.

name: Small on Top
summary: "Small on Top" is a full on adult furry RPG with character driven events and narrative. It follows the Adventurer as he tries to find out why he woke up in the forest.

name: SM64 Melee
summary: A mod for Super Mario 64 which makes Mario's physics the same as those from Super Smash Bros. Melee, allowing techniques like the wavedash and middair jump.

name: Smooth Criminals
summary:
"Smooth Criminals is a 3D action adventure game where you play as a team of 4 art thieves and steal from the clutches of the narcissist Count Egor von Vile.

- Switch at anytime between 4 characters with different skills: Fighting, Shooting, Driving, and Platforming
- Disable security systems and sneak past guards.
- Steal paintings and escape!

Made in the University of Southern California Advanced Games Project class using Unreal Engine 4."

name: SMB RMX Land
summary: One Day In Sarasaland, Mario (Or Whoever You Are Playing As) is running through the desert and Encounters Thicc Boi Who Is Wielding The Phantom Ruby. The Hero Gets Teleported Away To Another Part Of The Desert And Meets A Wiggler Named Harold And A Snorpler Named Gerald. The Two Siblings Are Trying To Stop Thicc Boi From Destroying The Fabric Of Reality. The Hero And The Two Worm Brothers Set Out Two Stop Thicc Boi Before It Is Too Late...

name: Smiling Girls
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Smove
summary:
Swipe up, down, left, and right to dodge your way through 10 simple yet challenging worlds all while vying for the top spot by collecting the most points.

Think you have Smove moves?

Show us what you've got.

name: Smile Simulation
summary: Psychological-surreal-analog-survival horror game. Find the smiles and get out.

name: Smash Hit Plunder
summary:
Smash Hit Plunder is a PlayStation®VR tear-it-up set in a medieval castle and its sprawling surroundings. You play as a mage – you think you’ve just inherited the castle of your dreams from your family, but actually it’s been magically locked up by a ghostly debt collector. Now it’s down to you to find enough hidden treasure in the castle to pay off the debt… 
 
Thanks, wasteful ancestors! 
 
Go on treasure hunts, defeat your enemies and hide from ghosts as you plunder your way through a castle in virtual reality. Grab your loot and keep smashing!

name: SM192: Rooftops
summary: Five speedjam levels, custom skyboxes and a music track.

name: Smash Remix: Spider-Man
summary: A mod for Smash Remix (Super Smash Bros. mod) which adds Spider-Man as a playable character.

name: Smash Cup
summary: Dive into the Smash Cup universe! This genre-blending top-down shooter allows you to craft your own base, combining MOBA, tower defense and deck-building elements for a unique battle experience!

name: SMBW Randomizer
summary: A Super Mario Bros. Wonder randomizer programmed in Python using a modular approach.

name: Smash T.V.
summary: Amiga port of Smash T.V.

name: Smugglers of Cygnus: Cygnus Pizza Race
summary: Compete against the galaxy’s finest pizza delivery wannabes in this high-speed thrill ride! Challenge your friendships and sabotage your friends in two-person, head-to-head local races that put your piloting skills to the test in . . . The Cygnus Pizza Race!

name: Smash Remix: Version 1.5.0
summary: An update to Smash Remix which adds new characters, namely Ebisumaru from the Goemon series, Banjo & Kazooie and even Dragon King, from Dragon King: The Fighting Game, a cancelled game which became Super Smash Bros, along with many new features like modes, options, stages and items.

name: SMW The Princess Rescue
summary:
The Princess Rescue is a traditional Mario Adventure where you play through 9 new worlds to save the princess.
This hack is more focused on the vanilla elements and the level design, it features new levels, custom music, Super Mario World and Super Mario Maker graphics and more.

name: Smart Logic Games:Toddler Kids & Baby Learning App
summary:
Smart Logic Games is a learning logical app for 2-5-year-old kids. It includes several training mini-games. 
The friendly and intuitively clear app's interface provides the most fascinating and exciting way for children to get new knowledge by themselves. 

The application contains several logical mini-games (6 games with 36 levels in the full version of the app).
Through playing an interesting game children introduce a good many of useful concepts and learn to recognize differences between objects. 

The game includes several parts, namely: 
-	Animal's food 
-	Logical chains 
-	What is missed?
-	Sizes of objects
-	and many others

This game allows to improve kids' logic as well as their attention, motility, agility, quickness, and diligence.

name: Smash It Wild
summary: Smash It Wild is a tactical turn-based game combining volleyball and dodgeball in a fantasy universe. Upgrade your players and defeat your opponents in an intense roguelike competition!

name: Smashy Road: Arena
summary:
From the makers of the Award winning game: Smashy Road: Wanted, we present to you: Smashy Road: Arena!

It's time to pick up your WEAPONS and battle ONLINE with MULTIPLAYER! Race through the 8 different environments and escape the POLICE, the FBI, the SWAT the ARMY JEEPS and the TANKS! Use your weapons to last as long as you can! Master all 30 VEHICLES, all 30 COLORS and all 10 WEAPONS.

name: Smash Remix: Version 1.3.0
summary: The third update to Smash Remix adds Marina from Mischief Makers to the roster, along with King Dedede from the Kirby series. There are also new stages and new features.

name: Smash Remix: Version 1.4.0
summary:
The fourth update to Smash Remix adds Goemon from the Mystical Ninja/Goemon franchise to the roster, along with new stages and features.

Two new playable characters from the Star Fox series were added: Slippy Toad and Peppy Hare.

name: Small Cell
summary: Play as a Small Cell that has just come to life and seeks to understand the purpose of its existence. Your objective is to help this mini-hero to discover the meaning of its life in this mini-environment.

name: SM64EX Coop: Mega Man X
summary: A mod for SM64EX Coop that adds Mega Man X.

name: Smooth Operators
summary: Create and build your own Call Center in Smooth Operators. Develop client relationships while balancing your financials and workload. Plan an efficient operation through micro management of your workforce while achieving objectives. Can you create a successful operation?

name: Smart Alex and Smart Alice: Curious Kids
summary: Educational game featuring the Sega Pico's mascot.

name: SM64 Sapphire
summary: SM64 Sapphire is a ROM hack made by Nebula. It was released around the tail end of 2017, it contains 6 levels, 1 secret level and has 30 stars.

name: Smash It
summary: You're a young kid who likes to Smash anything and everything in his path. Smash as many objects as you can to be the worlds best Smasher!

name: Smitty 2
summary: Smitty 2 brings back the adorable platforming adventure into a brand new level! Walk, hop and sprint through the interconnected areas around Dripsdale and search for Dropple Capsules and Energy Pellets scattered throughout.

name: SM177: Escher
summary: 4 Escher Maps by Cocerello (Quoth), Doomer, digs, and Shamblernaut

name: SM
summary: A Super Metroid decompilation for PC.

name: Small Press Tycoon
summary: The original DIY publishing adventure sim

name: Smash Court Tennis Pro Tournament
summary: In this officially licensed tennis game from Namco, you can play in all four major tournaments of the tennis season: The Australian Open, Wimbeldon, the French Open and the US Open, with the best players in the world including Andre Agassi, Lleyton Hewitt, Monica Seles and more from the top 8 of both the ATP and WTA tournaments. Single and multiplayer modes are included.

name: Smile Inc.
summary:
Welcome to SMILE Inc.™!
Roman Atwood and crew have FINALLY decided to get real jobs – the only problem is where they’ve been hired!

Deadly booby traps, devious machinery, and ruthless contraptions clutter the floors of your new office. How far can you climb up the corporate ladder before the lethal reality of business claims another victim?


**FEATURES**

• TONS of playable characters to level-up!
• Hilarious cameos from the Smile More™ family!
• Insane traps to dodge and conquer!
• Over 50 missions with special objectives!
• HATS!
• Mystery boxes with special surprises!
• Powerups and special abilities to help you survive!
• …And MORE!


New missions every day and special holiday events means there’s always action happening at SMILE Inc.™!

Ready to get to work?

name: Smashbox Arena
summary: Team-based action game with insane physics-driven power-ups. Shoot, duck behind cover, and coordinate with teammates...all in glorious VR! Play both Singleplayer Story Mode and Online Multiplayer!

name: Smart Baby Shapes
summary:
Smart Baby Shapes – is an outstanding bright game, which will acquaint your kid with the main colors, shapes and sizes easily and clearly while playing.
The app teaches to distinguish shapes, sizes and colors, as well as to pronounce studied terms correctly.

The app includes both static and moving objects, which promotes better development of kid’s coordination and fine motor skills.

Smart Baby Shapes app is suitable for children from 2 years and above.

Simple and intuitive control will make the first encounter with various colors and shapes easy and cheerful.

Distinctive features of the app:

- Includes 4 games for studying shapes, colors and sizes (more than 40 levels) 
- All levels are created on a “simple-to-complex” basis, a kid of any age can start playing
- Enables to study all the main colors and shapes, which are necessary for a kid’s early development 
- Simple and intuitive one-touch control 
- Develops kid’s logic, fine motor skills and attention

name: Smash Boats: Waterlogged Edition
summary: LET'S GO SMASH! Bash, crash and smash through schools of enemies and horrendous hazards to collect star to become the ULTIMATE SMASHER!

name: Smuggler's Run: Warzones
summary:
Race around five unique massive levels transporting various contrabands all the while avoiding police and other smugglers.

You are a smuggler working for Frank Luger who's company will transport anything anywhere. (Except drugs, kids, say no to drugs.) There are over 175 different missions with dozens of different objectives from a simple race to destroying a target to transporting 15 different contraband in less than 20 minutes.

name: Small Soldiers
summary: A keychain game based on the Small Soldiers movie.

name: SM64: Rocky Mountain Revisited
summary: Super Mario 64: Rocky Mountain Revisted is a 7-star mini-hack that reimagines the old version of Whomp's Fortress from its Spaceworld 95' demo, also known as Rocky Mountain.

name: Smash Cars
summary: Real-time physics, innovative stunts and next-generation graphics combine into a dynamic, tricked-out RC car racing experience where players twist and turn, grind and gear up, performing aerial tricks and stunts while racking up points as they race to the finish in an unlikely location. Slam into unwitting tourists as you race for the finish. Set on a beautiful resort island, the fast-paced, bumper car gameplay transforms the relaxing setting into a frenzied raceway.

name: Smuggler's Run
summary:
Drive, evade and explore anywhere across 3 vast levels - Rocky Mountain forest, desert and icy tundra.
As a member of a gang of international smugglers, it's your job to evade the U.S. Border Patrol, CIA and cutthroat rivals to deliver illegal cargo. It'll take complete mastery of your off-road vehicle to make it across unforgiving terrain and stay one step ahead...and make the drop.

name: Smash Bandits
summary: The tables are turned with this free-to-play sequel to Smash Cops, casting the player as not Smokey, but the Bandit.

name: Smurf
summary: Double Wide Screen version of Smurf.

name: Smash Bros. Rumble
summary: A freeware Smash Bros. fan game made by one developer.

name: Small Ball
summary: This is a casual game,control small ball arrive at the destination,include 4 mini games

name: Smoky White
summary: A short visual novel set on a snowy winter rooftop, where you meet and part ways with a mysterious upperclassman. The story branches into different endings based on your dialogue choices.

name: Smart Baby Sorter HD
summary:
Smart Baby Sorter is an easy to understand and exciting app for early development of children from 2-3 years.
Compare and sort objects with one touch. Each child will be able to play regardless of his or her age.

The app includes 12 mini-games with different colorful combinations of the objects under study. The games are built on the principle "from the simple to the complex" and will keep your child occupied from the very first minutes.
The child will get acquainted with a variety of different concepts and objects and learn to distinguish them.

The games include such concepts and objects as:
- Simple shapes, colors and sizes
- Animals and birds
- Sea creatures
- Land, water, and space transport
- Vegetables, fruits and berries
- Seasons

The application allows your child to develop logic, as well as attention, fine motor skills and discipline successfully and independently.

name: Smog City
summary: Smog City is a 10 level mapset for Doom II with a toxic, industrial theme.

name: Smile Pretty Cure! Let's Go! Marchen World
summary: Smile Pretty Cure! Let's Go! Marchen World is a Nintendo 3DS game starring the characters from Smile Pretty Cure!.

name: SMW The Princess Rescue 2: Luigi's Journey!
summary:
Sequel to the first The Princess Rescue. Here you plays as Luigi in an adventure to save Princess Daisy behind the scenes of Mario’s adventure of the first game.
This hack is a traditional adventure with 9 new worlds, with 92 new levels, custom sprites, graphics music and etc. Also features some gameplays mechanics from the first game but some of them have been improved.

name: Smarties: Meltdown
summary:
Smarties: Meltdown is a 3D action platformer game. The game lets the player control one of the sweet Nestlé snacks and has to save the Smarties factory spaceship from an invasion by the evil dr. Soursweet and his underlings.

The player takes control of a Smartie called Big Blue who is equipped with a power suite that enables him to walk and jump. Blue can also use hand-to-hand combat or a range weapon called the Choco Ray to defeat the underlings of dr. Soursweet. Permanent and temporary upgrades like super role and Super boots can be collected along the way.

name: SMYS: Gem Blocks
summary: Get your stairs to look stairstastic! This DLC unlocks the Gem block style.

name: SMYS: Crystal Blocks
summary: Get your stairs to look stairstastic!This DLC unlocks the Crystal block style.

name: SMYS: Retro Blocks
summary: Get your stairs to look stairstastic!This DLC unlocks the Retro block style.

name: SMYS: Retro Blocks
summary: Get your stairs to look stairstastic!This DLC unlocks the Retro block style.

name: Smash Frenzy 4
summary: Blast off with the most spectacular brick-buster yet in Smash Frenzy 4, an ingenious addition to the hit series. Aliens have kidnapped thousands of men, women, and animals and transported to another dimension. Use your ship and ball to break apart 3D levels, save the humans, and send the alien invaders home. Play the most exhilarating Smash Frenzy yet in Smash Frenzy 4 today!

name: Smash Frenzy 2
summary: Smash Frenzy 2 is a brick bashing assault on the senses! Three-dimensional levels immerse you in the action as a giant T-Rex rampages through a teeming metropolis and a fire crew hoses down a towering inferno. As you obliterate these scenes with your ball and paddle, powerups rain down from above, allowing you to launch missiles and put multiple balls into play! Best of all, Smash Frenzy 2 is as easy to play as the classic Breakout, making it a favorite of casual gamers worldwide!

name: Smack
summary: Step into the retro world of "Smack," where you'll face off against a swarm of tiny cube monsters inside a simulated arcade cabinet. Your job? Slam them down before they take over!

name: Small Soldiers
summary:
Small Soldiers is a platformer based on the movie of the same name. The plot revolves around a war between two factions of toy soldiers, the Gorgonites and the the Commando Elite. The player takes the role of Archer, the leader of the Gorgonites, who has to cross five levels while facing the Commando Elite's soldiers.

The goal is simply to find the goal without dying; in one instance within a hidden time limit. However, during the first four levels Archer is completely defenseless and has to dodge the enemies. The last level introduces two new gameplay mechanics: a bow which stuns enemies and simple switch puzzles. The levels are side-scrolling, but there are junctions.

This game is unrelated to the PlayStation and PC release of the same name.

name: Smilemo
summary: A new side-scrolling platformer where you go flying out of control at the slightest touch! In this virus-infected world, it is your job to collect the scattered pieces of vaccine code and exterminate the virus!

name: Smurfs Save the Day: Handy Smurf
summary: A Smurfs game for the Atari VCS Voice Module. Teaches about shapes.

name: Smash Club: Streets of Shmeenis
summary: After the collapse of the Super Boys organization, street gangs fought among themselves for power over Boot City. In the end, a gang lead by Supreme Leader Shmeenis rose to take control. A modern classic brawler.

name: Smashy Road: Wanted
summary: Outrun the cops in this multi-directional endless runner from Bearbit Studios.

name: Smoking Snakes
summary: In Smoking Snakes you are part of the Brazilian Expeditionary Force (B.E.F) fighting Axis in Italian territory during World War II.
